A Wilder Life is a book that is divided into sections. These sections are about different seasons. The book is also about self-reliance, growing and gardening, cooking, health and beauty, and wilderness. The book has photos and illustrations that make you think of the great outdoors. This book shows that it is possible to get in touch with nature.
